1.title: Rebuilding with Bodybuilding
1.plot: In our premiere for season 2 of RBT, 3 incredible and inspiring stories. Jerrika DeBoer is a mother of 5 who has overcome sexual and physical assault where she had her organs stomped in, had cigarettes put out on her and assaulted with screwdrivers and left for dead only to use bodybuilding to make a physical and emotional comeback. Wallace Wong, a chef who has worked at some of the best restaurants in the world who has overcome childhood obesity and cancer to make it to the national stage. Lastly, Reggie Dava, a police officer and family man who is the fastest OPA ...

3.title: OPA Girls Pt. 2: The Return!
3.plot: Last year (Episode 12) we followed three incredible stories of women making their way through the Ontario Physique Association (OPA) in search of an IFBB pro card.

4.title: Maritime Muscle
4.plot: Watch three amazing people embark on their radical body transformations including Raymond D'Almeida going from 240 lbs to 173 ripped. Then fit couple Humberto Kauffmann and Kateryna Zhbanova go to nationals in Atlantic Canada at Heather Leblanc's amazing promotion.

5.title: Tribute to Jim Morris
5.plot: This moving must see tribute to bodybuilding promoter Jim Morris includes a powerful interview with him and Yolanda Rosato as well as montage of his life in light of his recent passing. Jim started as a bodybuilder and then ended up co promoting the Toronto Pro Show with Ron Hache. In his last interview we discuss his life in reflection knowing he was losing a fight with cancer. Also in this episode we follow Laura Sturge Kendall (interviewed by Heather Leblanc) as she competes in bikini in her native maritimes at nationals after an amazing weight loss transformation....

6.title: OPA Gala
6.plot: In this latest episode we follow several inspiring stories including Yolanda Rosato who's faith as a born again Christian motivates her to overcome the illness (and unfortunate passing) of her close friend Jim Morris (also featured) on her path to competing in masters at the national level and a top five placing. The story delves deeper into their friendship and is a good counterpart to the last episode "A tribute to Jim Morris". We also hear how she works to foster self improvement by working with underprivileged children. Moe Belec is also featured as he transforms ...

7.title: Never Too Late
7.plot: Watch as IFBB Pro and martial artist Jay Crawford reaches new levels of physical potential at 47 (competing with guys half his age) while fit mom and fit dad swolemates Alissa and Jeff Boris train and raise a family together and encourage their own natural transformations as they compete on a national level in middle age. One of the motivations for Jeff was the untimely passing of his brother. It's never too late to get fit.

8.title: Dream, Believe, Achieve
8.plot: In the latest Radical Body Transformation we have two super inspiring stories of natural bodybuilding Christopher Worth and Jack Halverson as they demonstrate why there are no excuses to get into shape. Filmed in Duluth, Minnesota we see Christopher achieve his dreams on stage on his 45th birthday after overcoming bullying and a massive 50+ pound weight loss. Meanwhile Jack also hits the stage in killer condition at the age of 57 after a battle with diabetes and a heart attack. Special thanks to Promoter Leif Anderson and guest host Kaelin Patterson.

9.title: Radical Body Transformation 4K, Ep 26: You Are Stuck With You, Embrace It
9.plot: This documentary length special episode of RBT shot in 4k tracks the fitness journeys of three regular people who accomplish extraordinary things and transform their lives at Bodilogix Fitness gym in Cobourg Ontario, Canada. Under the guidance of head trainer Andrea Johnson as well as Alison Burnham, we see over several months and sometimes years, the incredible positive change that can occur through determination, goal setting, training and diet. We open with Kelly O'Connor who like many mothers and wives has felt she has let her body go as she has prioritized ...

10.title: Reach For The Stars
10.plot: We see Maria Mikola who has been a long time fan of the show, working with Darren Mehling of Freak Fitness and her friend Bernie Mockler work their way up the ranks. After following for 3 years we see Maria become an IFBB Pro and compete successfully in various pro shows, first in women's Physique and then transferring to women's Bodybuilding. Meanwhile Stacey Blizzard Vautour competes in bikini at world qualifiers in Moncton, New Brunswick in a stacked line up, at the age of 47, but with the support of her husband she emerges with surprising results.

11.title: On Bended Knee
11.plot: In Episode 28 of RBT Blake Gautheir is a giant of a man, with an even bigger heart. He realized he needed to lose weight when he had trouble even getting on his knee to play with his young daughter. With that motivation he took it upon himself to lose weight and make a radical change for his health, his family and his future. Meanwhile Mikayla Brie Custance has always been self conscious about being skinny and lacking curves. She undergoes a radical transformation, going from a delicate young adult to a She-Ra proud of her muscle and internal/external strength. This ...

16.title: Season Finale Part 1
16.plot: In the first part of a double episode of James Hergott's continuing 'Radical Body Transformations' series 5% Rich Piana athlete Jenaya Hofer seeks her pro card at the NPC North Americas with Darren Mehling's guidance and challenges host Hergott to a deadlift competition (with disastrous results!) Josh Careme aims to take the stage for the first time, inspired by his mother's fight with Cancer. Jeff McNaughton is a business owner looking to get into shape in his 50's and try out bodybuilding. Parastoo Badie and Carrie Elizabeth are on track to the OPA stage working ...

imdb.plot outline: Follows select men and women as they are partnered with elite trainers. Their transformations are followed as they get their bodies into their all time best condition, usually the payoff being a contest. Also covered are individuals from various experience and physique divisions, from body building to bikini.
imdb.title: Radical Body Transformation
plot: Follows select men and women as they are partnered with elite trainers. Their transformations are followed as they get their bodies into their all time best condition, usually the payoff being a contest. Also covered are individuals from various experience and physique divisions, from body building to bikini.::James Hergott

Bodybuilder and trainer James Hergott meet people from all walks of life yearning to transform their bodies as they embark on their journey towards inner and outer growth and development in this inspiring documentary and TV show, starring James Hergott and various special guests including the legendary Arnold Schwarzenegger.::MY Spotlight Independent and Stacks Films
